name: Please Stop Shooting
description:
Please
Stop
Shooting

Why can't people just stop trying to shoot each other? 

Try to save these two cities from destroying each other by shooting down their missiles.

Made for Trijam #214 in 3 hours.

Controls
  • Mouse: Aim
  • Left Click: Shoot
  • R: Restart 
Tools
  • Godot 3.5
  • Aseprite
  • Paint.NET
  • rFXgen
